          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Pourquoi les satellites satellisent la terre à de grandes hauteurs</string>
            <string language="en">Why satellites orbit the earth at great heights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum Satelliten die Masse auf großen Höhen in 
Umlauf bringen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porque os satélites orbitam a terra em alturas 
grandes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè i satelliti orbitano intorno alla terra 
alle altezze grandi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί οι δορυφόροι βάζουν τη γη σε τροχιά στα μεγάλα 
ύψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porqué los satélites mueven en órbita alrededor
de la tierra en las grandes alturas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration avec légende montre pourquoi  les satellites restent bien au-dessus de l'atmosphère de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration with labelling shows why satellites stay well above the Earth's atmosphere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'atmosphère</string>
            <string language="en">atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">frottement</string>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellite</string>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung mit dem Beschriften zeigt, warum 
Satelliten gut über der Atmosphäre der Masse bleiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração com etiquetar mostra porque os 
satélites permanecem bem acima da atmosfera da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione con identificare mostra 
perchè i satelliti rimangono ben sopra l'atmosfera della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση με το μαρκάρισμα εμφανίζει γιατί οι
δορυφόροι μένουν αρκετά παραπάνω από τη γήινη ατμόσφαιρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración con el etiquetado muestra 
porqué los satélites permanecen bien sobre la atmósfera de la 
tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
